description: A representation of an array of quantitative values, optionally with uncertainties.
label: Quantitative value array
name: QuantitativeValueArray

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/negativ._instruction: Enter the negative uncertainties for all values. Note that the length of the arrays have to match.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/negativ.label: Negative uncertainties
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/negativ.name: negativeUncertainties

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/positiv._instruction: Enter the positive uncertainties for all values. Note that the length of the arrays have to match.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/positiv.label: Positive uncertainties
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/positiv.name: positiveUncertainties

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/typeOfU._instruction: Add the type of estimation for the uncertainties.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/typeOfU.description: Distinct technique used to quantify the uncertainty of a measurement.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/typeOfU.label: Type of uncertainty
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/typeOfU.name: typeOfUncertainty

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/unit._instruction: Add the unit of measurement of the values and their uncertainties.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/unit.description: Determinate quantity adopted as a standard of measurement.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/unit.label: Unit
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/unit.name: unit
